41.eng-name: The Book of al-Fara' and al-'Atirah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Maimunah, the wife of the Prophet, that:some men of Quraish passed by the Messenger of Allah dragging a sheep the size of a donkey. He said to them: "Why don't you take its skin?" They said: "It is dead meat." The Messenger of Allah said: "Purify it with water and Qaraz

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُدْبَغُ بِهِ جُلُودُ الْمَيْتَةِ
chapter.eng-name: With What The Skin Of A Dead Animal Is Tanned
